alert.note: Alert for Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 08 at 3:08AM MST until December 09 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO NOON PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. Local accumulations 3 to 5 inches north of a line from Colfax to Potlatch. * WHERE...Tekoa, Uniontown, Moscow, Colfax, Rosalia, Potlatch, Plummer, Genesee, Oakesdale, Pullman, and La Crosse. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to Noon PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
